Articles.Content:
SAS works fine for pointing the right way, but doesn't do much for roll (other than stabilizing it).

For rockets roll doesn't really matter, but for planes it does, and I often find myself busy finetuning the roll so that my wings are nice and level. While SAS could do that as well. So my suggestion: add an option for prograde and wings level, and/or for stabilize pitch, while nulling yaw and roll (useful if you want to keep pitch up a few degress).

Oh...  I thought this was going to be something like a maintain neutral VSI feature request for sustained atmospheric flight.  Which I do think would be quite useful.

However, not sure I've run into the need so much for what was described.  The SAS already does a decent job of holding a set pitch on reentry.  ...and roll stabilization seems fine to me too?

Edited January 27, 2020 by XLjedi

yes, we need this, 

although you can do this with mods, 
I use this one: https://spacedock.info/mod/1019/Kramax Autopilot Continued

is has a boatload of other features, but I mainly use it for stetting pitch and roll to a set number.
